beaches.name: Hillarys Dog Beach
beaches.description: Dog friendly beach that is overflowing with doggos, on weekends there is coffee!

beaches.name: South Beach
beaches.description: Dog friendly beach that is overflowing with doggos, grassy areas for them to dry off on!

beaches.name: Quinns Rocks Dog Beach
beaches.description: Calm sandy beach for you and your four legged friend!

beaches.name: North Beach Dog Beach
beaches.description: Located close to a bunch of dog friendly cafes, just keep in mind this is on the small side at 500m long

beaches.name: Peasholm Dog Beach
beaches.description: Fantastic dog beach with many facilites

beaches.name: South City Beach
beaches.description: Beautiful long beach, close to many dog friendly eateries

beaches.name: Mosman-Leighton Dog Beach
beaches.description: Great for energetic dogs as it is 2km long

walks.name: Noble Falls Walk Trail
walks.description: Pleasant 3.6km 45 minute stroll, best in spring when wild flowers are in bloom

walks.name: Kwinana Loop Trail
walks.description: This is a long ass walk, at 21km
